mapper.select: SELECT u.uidx , u.userID , u.userName , u.userPassword , u.userEmail , u.userPhone , u.userType , l.lodgingname , l.lodgingaddr , l.lidx , l.limagename FROM ausertb u LEFT OUTER JOIN lodgingtb l ON u.uidx = l.uidx WHERE u.uidx= #{uidx}

SELECT qna_idx , qna_Qtitle , qna_Qdate , qna_Acheck FROM ( SELECT qna_idx , qna_Qtitle , qna_Qdate , qna_Acheck , row_number() over(ORDER BY qna_idx DESC) AS qnum FROM qnatb WHERE qna_Qtitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND uidx = #{uidx}
) WHERE qnum BETWEEN #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} ORDER BY qna_idx DESC

SELECT count(qna_idx) FROM qnatb WHERE qna_Qtitle LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND qna_idx > 0
SELECT qna_idx , uidx , qna_Qcontent , qna_Qtitle , qna_Qdate , qna_Acontent FROM qnatb WHERE qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
SELECT l.uidx , l.lidx , r.ridx , r.rimage1 , r.rtype , r.rprice , r.rnum FROM lodgingtb l FULL OUTER JOIN roomtb r ON l.lidx = r.lidx WHERE l.uidx =#{uidx} ORDER BY r.RIDX DESC

SELECT r.ridx , r.rtype , r.rnum , r.rprice , r.maxmen , r.stdmen , r.rimage1 , r.bed , i.addinfo1 , i.addinfo2 , i.addinfo3 , i.addinfo4 , i.addinfo5 FROM roomtb r LEFT OUTER JOIN roomintb i ON r.ridx = i.ridx WHERE r.ridx= #{ridx}
SELECT * FROM LODGINGTB l, LODGINGINTB i, LODGINGINFOTB f WHERE l.lidx = i.lidx AND l.lidx = f.lidx AND l.lidx = #{lidx}
